name: Child of Calamity
desc: Enemy target obtains Borehole when entering battle: Borehole will record all Spores numbers accumulated by the holder. After accumulating 18 Spores, deals Quantum DMG to all enemies equal to 2200% of base DMG. For every debuff the enemy has, this DMG increases by 10%, up to an increase of 100%. Then, the accumulated spore count is cleared.
